Key Match Events: Jude Bellingham scored a stunning bicycle kick in the 95th minute to equalize the game.
Harry Kane scored the winning goal in the first minute of extra time.
Post-Match Reflections: England fans grew increasingly frustrated as their team seemed to lack belief.
England will need to be a far better team against Switzerland in the quarterfinals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Slovakia started far sharper than England and gave their opponents several warnings before scoring.
Others: England conceded first but came back to win their last three Euro games in which they conceded first.
Slovakia went closest to an equaliser just before the break in extra time.
